instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3208: What is 820-3208? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3208</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> EFI failed
threads.message:
Hi,
i have problem with this board, efi failed, do you know where is the problem?
the mba work on the system but display black line sometimes, and slow video.
In ASD OS, kernel panic, i can't test.
thanks for your help

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3208</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> EFI failed
threads.message: You need to reflash the BIOS with a clean ME region. Someones password unlocked it or swapped a BIOS chip for some reason or other, but not bothere cleaning up the intel ME region

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3208</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> EFI failed
threads.message: Does the serial number on the bottom match the one in OSX? If yes then read the ROM on a programmer and post it here for the ME region to be fixed.
